column4: depends really how your isp is authenticating - chap is pretty straightforward - update your /etc/ppp/chap-secrets & make sure in /etc/ppp/peers/dsl-provider you see a line "user youruser@blah"
Would I be using the peers/dsl-provider for dialup? Yes it's ubuntu/gusty/2.6.22-10-generic using Linuxant drivers on a Conexant HSF (should have mentioned that)...
but yes, dsl-provider is the default ppp config, and /etc/ppp/chap-secrets is where chap gets authentication details
